Code

While we've been active in maintaining open source projects we haven't traditionally released our own open source projects. That changes today! We're approaching our work with an eye to open source. We'll outline all our projects here as the library continues to grow. We look forward to working with many of you!

Projects

Hygieia

Introducing Hygieia, Capital One’s premiere Enterprise DevOps Dashboard. With this intuitive tool, you can create a simple drag and drop environment to keep up to date with the real time status of your in-house development projects. And they say nothing good in life is free…

View on GitHub

Contributing

As a bit of housekeeping, our legal department requires that you fill out our CLA prior to us accepting any pull requests.
